title: STAT+: FDA warned a Hims & Hers compounder after finding bugs and failing to report a serious side effect
description: FDA inspectors found a live spider and dead cricket in a facility that was compounding weight loss drugs for Hims & Hers.
content: FDA inspectors found a live spider and dead cricket in a facility that was compounding weight loss drugs for Hims & Hers.
